text: James Sebastian Faulkner (born July 18, 1948) or James Reed Faulkner is an English actor who is known for his roles in The Bank Job, Bridget Jones's Diary, Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason, Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London, and in Zulu Down. Faulkner was born on July 18, 1948 in Hampstead, London, England.http://www.jamesfaulkner.info/ The Official James Faulkner Website He is married to Kate Faulkner. They had two sons, Guy and Leo Faulkner. He now lives in London, England. ==References== ==Other websites== *The Official James Faulkner Website * *James Faulkner at the CrystalAcids Anime Voice Actor Database Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
title: James Faulkner
